properties.name: referenceImageUseFilePath
properties.description: Enable to use a file path for the image, disable to use binary data.

properties.name: referenceImageFilePath
properties.description: The full path to the image file on the ComfyUI server.

properties.name: referenceImageBinaryPropertyName
properties.description: The name of the binary property in n8n holding the image data.

properties.name: drivingVideoUseFilePath
properties.description: Enable to use a file path for the video, disable to use binary data.

properties.name: drivingVideoFilePath
properties.description: The full path to the video file on the ComfyUI server.

properties.name: drivingVideoBinaryPropertyName
properties.description: The name of the binary property in n8n holding the video data.

properties.name: positivePrompt
properties.default: A man with dark, wet, curly hair stands in a narrow alleyway in the rain, looking intensely at the camera. He is wearing a dark, hooded, waterproof jacket that is glistening with moisture The hood is down exposing his hair and face. The background is out of focus, with a warm light source creating a soft glow behind him, contrasting with the dark and moody atmosphere of the scene. A red brick wall is visible on the left side of the frame.
properties.description: The text prompt describing the desired output.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Must be divisible by 16. The reference image and driving video will be resized to this width.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Must be divisible by 16. The reference image and driving video will be resized to this height.

properties.name: outputAsFilePath
properties.description: Enable to receive a file path for the output, disable to receive binary data.

properties.name: outputFilePath
properties.description: The local path on the n8n server to save the output file to.

properties.name: outputBinaryPropertyName
properties.description: The name of the binary property in n8n to put the output data in.
